titleStmt.title: Edinburgh, the twenty third of February, one thousand six hundred and sixty four. The Lords of his Majesties Privy Council considering, that albeit it is appointed ... all persons in publick trust or office, should publickly ... subscribe the Declaration...
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, printer to the King's most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Signed at end: Pet. Wedderburne, Cl. Sti. Concilii.
Imperfect: cropped at head with partial loss of ornament.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
